channel.title: Drop Timer?
channel.description:
First of all, I'm not 100% sure where exactly this post should be...
So, I was really wondering if you can place a timer for 60 seconds from login (one minute) so that the person can't pickup items
For example:
Two people try to duplicate an item with the pvp trick player 1 kills player 2 and player 2 x-logs.
They log back in, but can't pickup the looted items because of the drop timer. (one minute)
And the other question that I have is, is it possible to set it so that only the person that killed the other person can get the drop. (So they can't simply bring a friend to loot the items)
Helping would be MUCH appreciated, though I have no money or anything to award you with, I would really love some help.
~Reguards, Allroun-

item.title: Drop Timer?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Sounds like the problem jagex had with the “76k Trick.”

As for this timer, I have no idea, and would more than likely be a pain to add.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop Timer?
item.dc:creator: @Rosiered Rosiered
item.description:
